messages.content: What is the area of lebanon in m2

The area of Lebanon is approximately 10,452 square kilometers. To convert this to square meters, you multiply by 1,000,000 (since 1 square kilometer equals 1,000,000 square meters). Therefore, Lebanon's area is about 10,452,000,000 square meters.
Yes, the area of Lebanon is approximately 10,452 square kilometers, which converts to 10,452,000,000 square meters.
what is the area in m2 of the united states of america

The area of the United States is approximately 9.83 million square kilometers. To convert this to square meters, you multiply by 1,000,000. Therefore, the area of the United States is about 9,830,000,000,000 square meters.
